sentence.Network_en: Results All the patients were diagnosed definitely and recovered well postoperatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果37例诊断明确,术后恢复良好,随访无复发.

sentence.Network_en: Postoperatively, a long - term rehabilitation training at home was carried out.
sentence.Network_cn: 4级, 大多数患者能参加正常工作.

sentence.Network_en: All patients survived the surgery, and none had neurologic deterioration immediately postoperatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的病人手术后均存活, 没有病例在手术后神经功能立即恶化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: subtotal removal of tumor in 13 cases ( 8.0 % ) . 4 patients died ( 2.5 % ) because of brain stem ischemia or oedema , and lung infection within two weeks postoperatively .13例（8.0％)为次全切除。4例（2.5％)于术后2周内因脑干缺血、水肿或肺部感染而死亡。
